metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12414 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: IndexedDB should be cleared when leaving private browsing mode and it is not, the API for WKWebViewConfiguration was being used incorrectly and requires the private instance of this object be deleted when leaving private mode. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 27.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this vulnerability is specific to iOS

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
